abstract.text: Streamlined interaction with Last.fm on Apple platforms

inlineContent.text: ScrobbleKit is a Swift package that simplifies the integration of Last.fmâ€™s API across all the Apple platforms, enabling the creation of applications that interact seamlessly with the popular music platform.

This package encompasses a comprehensive set of Last.fm API methods, providing developers with the tools to perform essential tasks such as scrobbling tracks, retrieving user charts, obtaining detailed album information, and supporting a wide range of other functionalities available in the Last.fm API catalog.
To begin using ScrobbleKit, you can check out our
guide for an easy introduction. Alternatively, you can select one of the topics below to go through specific functionalities in ScrobbleKit with step-by-step instructions.
